Those in charge of such a home should be men and women who are largehearted, cultured, and self-sacrificing; men and women who undertake the work 
                                                                           231
from love to Christ, and who train the children for Him. Under such care many homeless and neglected ones may be prepared to become useful members of society, an honor to Christ themselves, and in their turn helping others.-Ministry of Healing, pp. 205-206.
